description: Starohrvatska prosvjeta. ISSN: 0351-4536. Starohrvatska prosvjeta, which marked its 100 years publication in 1995, is the first scientific journal not only in Croatia, but also in the entire Slavic South, dedicated exclusively to topics from national archaeology. The programme, which was drawn up for the first issue, has not been significantly altered. Starohrvatska prosvjeta, having a variety of different topics that deal with all important scientific problems, informs about the latest research works conducted in that field and publishes site-reports, but also dedicates entire special volumes to significant sites and findings. 2012 Vol. III   No. 39 2011 Vol. III   No. 38 2010 Vol. III   No. 37 2009 Vol. III   No. 36 2008 Vol. III   No. 35 2007 Vol. III   No. 34 2006 Vol. III   No. 33 2005 Vol. III   No. 32 2004 Vol. III   No. 31 2003 Vol. III   No. 30 2001 Vol. III   No. 28-29 2000 Vol. III   No. 27 1999 Vol. III   No. 26 1998 Vol. III   No. 25 1997 Vol. III   No. 24 1996 Vol. III   No. 23 1995 Vol. III   No. 22 1991 Vol. III   No. 21.
title: Starohrvatska prosvjeta
